about_the_game: Receive three wallpapers for free. Use them as backgrounds for your desktop or anywhere you would like! If you enjoy the gift, please consider following our publisher page.

name: Golf Club Nostalgia - Wallpapers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M, 2 GB Memory
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Polish, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
